javadoc: Tool that serves as the the Ghidra Project Window. Only those plugins that implement the FrontEndable interface may be directly added to this tool by the user. Other plugins that are not marked as FrontEndable may get pulled in because the FrontEndable plugins depend on them. These plugins are aware of what tool they live in so that they can behave in the appropriate manner.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a new Ghidra Project Window.
@param pm project manager
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new Ghidra Project Window.

methods.javadoc:
Set the active project.
@param project may be null if there is no active project
methods.name: setActiveProject

params.name: project
params.comment: may be null if there is no active project

methods.javadoc:
Add the given project listener.
@param l listener to add
methods.name: addProjectListener

methods.javadoc:
Remove the given project listener.
@param l listener to remove
methods.name: removeProjectListener
checkIn
methods.comment: Check in the given domain file.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain file opened

params.name: taskListener
params.comment: listener that is notified when task completes

methods.name: checkIn
methods.comment: Check in the list of domain files.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain files opened

params.name: taskListener
params.comment: listener that is notified when task completes

params.name: parent
params.comment: parent of dialog if an error occurs during checkin

methods.name: merge
methods.comment:
Merge the latest version in the repository with the given checked out
 domain file.  Upon completion of the merge, the domain file appears
 as though the latest version was checked out.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain file opened

params.name: domainFile
params.comment: domain file where latest version will be merged into

params.name: taskListener
params.comment:
listener that is notified when the merge
 task completes

methods.name: merge
methods.comment:
Merge the latest version (in the repository) of each checked out
 file in fileList. Upon completion of the merge, the domain file appears
 as though the latest version was checked out.

params.name: tool
params.comment: tool that has the domain files opened

params.name: fileList
params.comment: list of files that are checked out and are to be merged

params.name: taskListener
params.comment:
listener that is notified when the merge task
 completes

name: FrontEndTool
comment:
Tool that serves as the the Ghidra Project Window.
 Only those plugins that implement the FrontEndable interface may be
 directly added to this tool by the user.
 Other plugins that are not marked as
 FrontEndable may get pulled in because the FrontEndable plugins depend
 on them. These plugins are aware of what tool they live in so that they
 can behave in the appropriate manner.
